text: Teraemi tomalokaka prthiraita khalipha (pratinidhi) niyukta karaiche arau te'om tomalokaka yi pradana karaiche se'i bisaye paraiksara uddesye tomalokara kichumanaka ana kichumanara oparata maryada pradana karaiche. Niscaya tomara raba drauta sasti pradanakarai arau niscaya te'om ksamasila, parama dayalu
